name: Public Abstract Void (PAV)
description:
Enter an abstract world inspired by the XXth century painting abstract movement and fight the dark entity to defend your right to a colourful life

This is a boss fight were you will need to dodge numerous attacks and buff you up  by harmonizing yourself with the colours you find in the environment

Find symbiosis with the right colours will buff your character in different ways : find your favorite and embrace its energy to defeat the nothingness, the eternal silence without hope, Death

commands to dashstand on a coloured abstraction to enter in symbiosis and play its mini game to gain the corresponding time limited buff!

A big thank you to VimLark for playing our game on stream! welcome everyone, hope you'll enjoy the game :)

Here's a quick explanation of the buffs :

  • YELLOW raises the RANGE of your shooting ; if you go at the bottom of the screen, you still hit the boss!
  • BLUE raises your DAMAGE, it shows by the bigger projectiles 
  • RED raises your SPEED movement
  • buffs last a few seconds during which you can't enter another colour, be patient!

    Public Abstract Void (PAV) is a jam game developed for the VimJam2 by three people
